Package com.backend.Services.Controllers

Class RestaurantController

java.lang.Object
com.backend.Services.Controllers.RestaurantController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/restaurant") public class RestaurantController extends Object
Controller that controls the data flow for the restaurant component
